videos.description: Jonathan Ward runs 16 yards for a touchdown to put the Chippewas on the board.
videos.headline: Ward races for a Central Michigan TD

videos.description: Romello Ross runs for a 30-yard gain and into Ball State territory.
videos.headline: Ross rumbles into Ball State territory

videos.description: Shane Morris hits Tyler Conklin for a 34-yard touchdown to extend the lead for Central Michigan.
videos.headline: Morris to Conklin TD extends the lead

videos.description: Shane Morris's second touchdown pass of the half to Corey Willis from 31 yards out pushes the lead for Central Michigan.
videos.headline: Morris finds Willis for TD

videos.description: Tee'ondre Harvey's 6-yard return off the block punt sets up Central Michigan deep in Ball State territory.
videos.headline: Special team's for Central Michigan breaks through

videos.description: Shane Morris finds Corey Willis for a 63-yard touchdown to widen the margin for Central Michigan

tracking.trackingName: NCF_Final Game Highlight (Morris to Willis strikes again for Central Michigan) 2017/21/10

videos.headline: Morris to Willis strikes again for Central Michigan

videos.description: Jonathan Ward's 30-yard gain on the ground sets up Central Michigan with a first and goal.
videos.headline: Ward continues to reek havoc on the Ball State defense
